translations: n.巡回审判；立法会议（assize 的复数）
v.依法规定……的价格（assize 的第三人称单数）

phrs.translation: 巡回审判, 行政会议英语
巡回法庭, 巡回法院

sentences.sentence: As he dreamed, he turned round, and his eyes fell upon the brass knob of the door which separated him from the Court of Assizes.
sentences.translation: 他一面沉思一面转过身子，他的视线触到了门上的铜钮，门那边便是刑庭了。

sentences.sentence: The 1971 Act, which abolished the assizes and quarter sessions, set up in their place the Crown Court which it made part of the Supreme Court of Judicature.
sentences.translation: 1971年《 法院法》废止了巡回法庭和季审法庭，代之以属于最高法院一部分的刑事法院。
